All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractVisualBoard
    general representation of a tabletop game, basically you can move around on it, methods assume that the board can be displayed in a matrix
    App
    main() class, creates a new GameRunner and runs it
    Controls
    handles clicking done by player, and has methods that other classes can use to find out what the player wants to do next
    Coordinates
    Coordinates
    FourPlayerVisualBoardBuilder
    implements VisualBoardBuilder for a Chinese Checkers game of 2 players
    GameInitializer
    initializes a game of Chinese Checkers
    GameRunner
    main Chinese Checkers game loop happens here
    GameWindow
    houses graphic for VisualBoard
    GameWindowBuilder
    build a GameWindow to be used for a game of Chinese Checkers to create the graphics for VisualBoard requires the field of a board to extend JButtonAdapter
    JButtonAdapter
    adapter for JButton
    JPanelAdapter
    adapter for JPanel
    ServerHandler
    handles communication with server in a game of Chinese Checkers
    SidePanel
    Side Panel for game window.
    SixPlayerVisualBoardBuilder
    implements VisualBoardBuilder for a Chinese Checkers game of 2 players
    ThreePlayerVisualBoardBuilder
    implements VisualBoardBuilder for a Chinese Checkers game of 2 players
    TwoPlayerVisualBoardBuilder
    implements VisualBoardBuilder for a Chinese Checkers game of 2 players
    VisualBoard
    VisualBoard -- code representation of a Chinese Checkers board, consists of multiples of VisualField, which determine the look of the board.
    VisualBoardBuilder
    VisualBoard builder, fills the VisualBoard with VisualField and VisualChecker.
    VisualBoardFactory
    uses implementations of VisualBoardBuilder to create a VisualBoard of a given type in BoardTypes
    VisualChecker
    representation of a tabletop game checker, right now the only way to customize it's look is to set it's Icon
    VisualField
    representation of a tabletop game field, you can set it's look and fill it with VisualChecker
